CODEINE_CYP2D6.summary: CYP2D6 converts codeine into morphine. Low activity makes drug ineffective. High activity causes toxicity.

CLOPIDOGREL_CYP2C19.summary: CYP2C19 activates clopidogrel. Reduced activity prevents drug from working.

WARFARIN_CYP2C9.summary: CYP2C9 breaks down warfarin. Slow metabolism increases bleeding risk.

SIMVASTATIN_SLCO1B1.summary: SLCO1B1 moves simvastatin into liver. Reduced function causes drug buildup.

AZATHIOPRINE_TPMT.summary: TPMT detoxifies azathioprine. Low activity causes toxicity.

FLUOROURACIL_DPYD.summary: DPYD breaks down fluorouracil. Deficiency causes severe toxicity.
